sections.MISSION:
3/2 Wolfpack Iron Hammer Troop TAC PLT conducts an Obstacle course to increase resilience and foster Espirt de Corps.​
PL YETI
Task org: OIC: 1LT Winston, Joshua RSO: SSG Ozaeta
Training PAX: 20 SM
​Commander’s
sections.END STATE:
Eligible Wolfpack Troopers complete obstacle course and begin the first part of a Resiliency progression

sections.CONCEPT OF OPERATION:
s. This operation will be conducted in three phases.
Phase I: Planning

sections.EXECUTION:
Begins with the arrival of all personal the obstacle course. They will set up the safety pads under the confidence climb, tough one, and weaver. Next the Platoon will walk though the obstacle course will a demonstrate a portion of each obstacle. Phase III: Recovery Begins with the soldiers completing the ruck march and ends when Soldiers return to the Troop footprint.
